FFr_EA4474CC.DisplayName.Text: ||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

FFr_EA4474CC.DisplayName.Context: Flow/v01 Mission Structure - Mission Centric/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

FFr_EA4474CC.Text.Text:
In this quest, the player/writer sets out to find a mythical narrative bible known as the Ehhh Aye*. Whoever wields the tome can use simple verbal prompts to generate narrative content guaranteed to make their game score 100% on Metacritic! 

Quest Outline: https://www.notion.so/chadbriggs/External-Lore-Page-Example-3c459c4d0ac842c99885f9059000c925?pvs=4



*See what I did there? Don't worry, there is a lot more where that came from! Hang on to yer knickers!

FFr_EA4474CC.Text.Context: Flow/v01 Mission Structure - Mission Centric/||QUEST_001 - The Narrative Bible of Ultimate Power

The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. The quick brown jump over me.

Quest Outline: (Notion Link Here)

Gives injected heroin as cause of death. Daria used "Find my phone" after Victor was missing for Days, and body was found.

DFr_FA4B2E92.Text.Text: Of course you do. *sigh* Go fetch the bucket of bits over there and I'll grant you early access to The Code.

DFr_6C2679B3.Text.Text:
I have reformed from my troubled ways.

Leo is doing well and is not in any trouble.

Victor often took care of me financially.

I didn’t know he had a love nest.

DFr_6C2679B3.Text.Context: Flow/Leo Statements/Leo: "I have reformed from my troubled wa..."

DFr_AE778612.Text.Text:
Victor hated drugs.

I am a confidential informant for the NBI drug investigation. 

I blackmailed Alex to keep him out of the NBI investigation.

Victor kicked me out of the club when he found out about the investigation.

I know where the love nest is.

DFr_AE778612.Text.Context: Flow/Leo Statements/Leo: "Victor hated drugs. I am a confi..."

Leo and I have been actively using the club to deal drugs.

I paid Leo for his silence.

Daria embezzled money from the club to help me pay Leo.

DFr_3A29262A.Text.Text:
I have been working on divorcing Victor because of his affair.

Liza is a gold-digger and Victor wanted a genetic test as proof.

I don’t know why Leo would have left and that is suspicious.

I didn’t know he had a love nest.

DFr_3A29262A.Text.Context: Flow/Daria Statements/Daria: "I have been working on divorcing Vi..."

DFr_5DBB4533.Text.Text:
Victor hated drugs.

I have been working on divorcing Victor because of my affair with Alex.

I am not worried about the will, as I can still benefit in both versions.

Someone is under investigation. I thought it was about me and the irregularities in our finances, but it wasn’t. It was about Leo.

DFr_5DBB4533.Text.Context: Flow/Daria Statements/Daria: "Victor hated drugs. I have been..."

DFr_6F7DBF79.Text.Text:
Victor hated drugs.

I am a former worker at the club and slept with Victor.

Victor is not the father of my child, despite me thinking he was. It must be my other relationship.

Daria is having an affair with Alex.

DFr_8527DCB9.Text.Text:
I worked at the club for years while building my influencer career.

Victor is the father of my child and I confronted him about it.

If anyone has heroin it would be that druggie, Alex. He and Leo are close.

I have never heard of the love nest.
